title: Musk risks even more damage to Twitter's business as the messaging app changes name to X
description: Elon Musk's rebranding of Twitter to X in pursuit of becoming a super app leaves the already vulnerable business at risk of further deterioration.

title: 'Oppenheimer' mania pushes Army to warn of long tourist lines at Trinity atomic test site
description: The Trinity Site on White Sands Missile Range is where the world's first atomic bomb was tested in 1945.

title: Apple opens Vision Pro headset applications for developers, but they can't talk about it
description: Apple opened up Vision Pro developer kit applications on Monday, ahead of a planned 2024 launch for the $3499 headset.

title: Apple reportedly considers raising the price of its new iPhone Pros
description: Apple didn't raise prices for new iPhones in the U.S. during the pandemic, although the company dealt with parts shortages and said inflation was raising costs.

title: Read Twitter CEO Linda Yaccarino's message to staff about the 'X' rebrand
description: Read CEO Linda Yaccarino's message to Twitter staff about the rebrand to X

title: China vows to 'adjust and optimize' property policy in 'torturous' economic recovery
description: Observers noted that the Politburo dropped the phrase "housing is for living in, not speculation" from its wording on the country's real estate sector.

title: Bitcoin falls sharply ahead of Fed meeting and as investors weigh Binance concerns
description: The price of bitcoin fell sharply and suddenly to start the week as investors awaited a major Federal Reserve policy decision and digested concerns around Binance.

title: Nikki Haley: 'Every company needs to have a Plan B' on China
description: Haley argues that U.S. companies should be ready to treat China as an enemy. It's a hawkish stance that could set Haley apart in the GOP presidential primary.

title: I've been a therapist for 10 years. Here are 9 things people want most in life—and how to get them
description: In a decade as a therapist, Charlotte Fox Weber has found there there 9 things human beings desire. She shares her best advice for making them a reality.

title: Elon Musk rebrands Twitter to 'X,' replaces iconic bird logo
description: Elon Musk rebrands Twitter to 'X,' removes iconic bird logo

title: Dove owner Unilever says it will permit conscription of its Russia employees
description: The company has faced criticism for its decision to continue to sell products and pay taxes in Russia following the country's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Extreme heat in Europe is becoming the new normal — prompting tourists toward cooler destinations
description: More tourists are thought to be prioritizing milder temperatures or off-season travel to avoid spending their time away in oppressive heat.

title: A 'momentous week' ahead as the Fed, ECB and Bank of Japan near pivot point
description: The U.S. Federal Reserve, the European Central Bank and the Bank of Japan will all announce crucial interest rate decisions this week.

title: A 10-year rally in U.S. home prices could be coming to an end, says Yale's Robert Shiller
description: A decade-long rally in U.S. home prices could finally come to an end once the Federal Reserve stops its rate-hiking cycle, said the professor of economics.

title: China property stocks tumble on renewed debt fears
description: Liquidity remains a concern for embattled Chinese property developers, which are struggling to emerge from a debt crackdown that started two years ago.

title: China has announced a slew of measures to bolster its economy. Here's what we know so far
description: Chinese leaders have signaled in recent weeks they are likely to be judicious and targeted in their policy support.

title: 'More than just idols': Behind the scenes with K-pop boyband Treasure
description: Treasure made its debut in 2020 while Covid-19 was spreading wildly around the world.

title: Goldman Sachs expects 'all time high' oil demand to spur large deficits, boosting prices
description: Goldman Sachs forecasts "sizeable deficits" in the oil markets driving higher crude prices, especially as an "all time high" demand for the commodity looms.

title: China to resume 15-day visa-free entry for citizens of Singapore and Brunei
description: China will reinstate its 15-day visa-free entry for citizens of Singapore and Brunei from July 26, according to the embassies of both countries.

title: Wall Street cut China’s GDP forecast many times this year. One bank adjusted 6 times
description: International investment firms have changed their China GDP forecasts nearly every month so far this year, with JPMorgan making six adjustments since January.

title: Apple supplier Foxconn's failed India chip venture shows how tough it is for new players
description: Foxconn is best known as the main assembler of Apple's iPhones. But in last couple of years, the Taiwanese firm has made a push into semiconductors.
